sentences.en: A written IQ test is merely a guideline.
sentences.cn: 书面智商测试仅供参考。

sentences.en: At the same time, analyze some strength guideline relationships of - high - strength concrete.
sentences.cn: 同时分析了超 高强 混凝土的几个强度指标间的关系.

sentences.en: Can you give me a guideline?
Enclosed is the format guideline of midterm report for your reference.
sentences.cn: 附档是关于期中分组报告的格式,供各位参考.

sentences.en: Objective. To present the treatment guideline for spinal diseases in pregnant women.
sentences.cn: 研究目的: 引入一种针对妊娠期妇女发生脊柱疾病的治疗准则.

sentences.en: Our guideline would be the prevailing world market prices.
sentences.cn: 我们要以当时的国际市场的价格为准绳.

sentences.en: Our predecessors'ideology can serve as a guideline for our work.
sentences.cn: 前辈的思想体系对于我们的工作很有指导意义.

sentences.en: Relevant instruction or guideline are well used and managed ( include filing ).
sentences.cn: 相关的说明或指引档能有效地使用及管理 ( 包括整理归案 ).

sentences.en: Something that serves as a guide or an example ; a guideline.
sentences.cn: 准则作为指导或 榜样 的东西.

sentences.en: The guideline should be simple to be easily monitored and understood.
sentences.cn: 该方针应易于监管和理解.

sentences.en: The study is of theoretic innovation and as a guideline in practice.
sentences.cn: 本论文的研究具有理论上的创新性和实践上的参考指导性.

sentences.en: This chapter gives you some guidelines to help you in your work.
sentences.cn: 本章将介绍一些指导性原则，为你的工作提供帮助。

sentences.en: This guideline is the reliability principle, also called the objectivity principle.
sentences.cn: 这一方针是可靠性原则, 也称为客观性原则.

sentences.en: This is probably the most important interaction design guideline.
sentences.cn: 这基本上是最重要的交互设计指导准则.

sentences.en: Under the guideline, the output of streamlined seamless liners declines linearly.
sentences.cn: 在该方针的指引下, 流线型无缝班机的产量直线降落.

sentences.en: Zhao: What's your guideline in choosing songs for your audience?
sentences.cn: 赵: 你为听众选择歌曲的原则是什么?

trans.tran_en: rules or instructions about the best way to do something
